makers.displaymaker: Harold Wong (Huang Zhongfeng) 黃中方, born 1943, Shanghai, China; active Hong Kong

texts.textentryhtml: Transferred from artist Harold Wong to [Catherine Maudsley Ltd., Hong Kong], 1998–before May 1999;  sold to Randolph and Jennifer Sullivan, May 1999; collection of Randolph and Jennifer Sullivan, May 1999–September 28, 2023; [Christie’s NY, Arts of Asia Online, Sale #22041, Lot 152, September 28, 2023], sold to Anonymous “Friends and Admirers of Cary Y. Liu.”, 28 September 2023–2024; gifted to the Princeton University Art Museum, 2024.
